title: Turn on Torch (not flash) in Camera app.
content:
The device is actually Pixel 1 XL, but that was not on the list.
It is running Android 10 with the 6 October 19 update (latest available).

There used to be an option to have the (torch) flashlight on all the time when in the Camera app.
Now when I turn it and then go to the camera app it turns the flashlight off, I cannot see option in the Camera app to turn the light permanently back on which used to be there.

I use the phone to inspect things that I cant get my eye to but I can hold the phone at and some of these places are dark so I want to turn the torch on.  Often I am not interested in taking an actual picture.  Most of the time when I take a picture using the flash in these situations the results are of no use.

How do I keep the light on with the camera app open?
